new_application_description: Access local service jobs, manage your schedule, and receive instant payouts. Your effort, your rules.
new_application_first: Get local service requests in your area – no client hunting required, even for newcomers.
new_application_second: See your earnings upfront. Withdraw funds within 2 hours – zero hidden fees.
new_application_thirst: Higher ratings boost your visibility. Earn trust, attract better clients, and grow your income.
error_500_description: Refresh the page or try again later.
payments_empty_description: Once you complete your first order, your earnings will appear here.
orders_empty_description: Your upcoming jobs will appear here once you accept them.
finalize_order_modal_description: Are you sure you want to finalize your order?
